review_title: Working for St Barnabas Hospice Lincs
job_title: Cloud and Server Specialist in Lincoln, England
pros: Everyone is very friendly and welcoming. We connect like a family and go out of our way to provide the best patient care.
cons: I can't think of any cons at presend

pros: The care side of the Hospice is valuable and the clinical teams do an excellent job.
cons: Terrible management withing the Fundraising Department, with complete staff churn over 3 years: this situation is ongoing and has not been addressed.

job_title: Pizza Delivery Driver in Lincoln, England
cons: slightly short staffed and covid poses increasing risk of this

review_title: Incredible place to work where your role has a positive impact on end-of-life care
job_title: Marketing & Communications Assistant in Lincoln, England
pros: St Barnabas Hospice is a truly wonderful place to work. because I know that every single part of the work I do is for the greater good. It’s so rewarding being able to positively impact lives each and every day and I’ve met so many amazing people through my job who I am never going to forget. Everyone who works for the Hospice is united around the same goal of improving the quality of end-of-life care in Lincolnshire and the bonds I have developed with my colleagues because of this are so strong. The management will always listen to you and I would feel comfortable chatting with anyone in the organisation, regardless of hierarchy.
cons: I can't think of any cons - it's an amazing place to work.
